attributes.action: Referendum enabling only Leave MP's & Brexit Parties to negotiate UK's EU exit
attributes.background:
In 2016 the public voted for the UK to leave the EU. 
It is now time for the people to be given the opportunity to choose who should negotiate our departure.
Leave MP's (ERG etc)
Brexit Parties (Brexit, UKIP, DUP etc)

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes petitions calling for people to be given jobs or removed from jobs.

There are already petitions about leaving the EU, which you might like to sign, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
